titleStmt.title: The church-sleeper awakened, or A discourse on Act. 20. 9. being the substance of two sermons composed and preached at Corke in Ireland. / By Joseph Eyres master of arts, and a servant of God in the Gospel of his son.
titleStmt.author: Eyres, Joseph.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Godbid, for Joseph Cranford, at the sign of the kings-Head in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the kings-Head in St. Pauls Church-yard
